text: Choteau is a city in Montana in the United States. It is the county seat of Teton County. About 1,700 people lived there in 2020. It is named for French fur-trapper and explorer Pierre Chouteau, Jr. ==Notable residents== * John Edward Erickson, Governor of Montana * A.B. Guthrie Jr., American novelist * David Letterman, late night talk show host * J. K. Ralston, western painter Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana
title: Choteau, Montana
